Advance.name: 进军 Advance
Advance.description:
机动

你的军队尝试拉近一支非接战的目标敌军的距离，尝试一次@Check[reflex|traits:action:advance]检定

大成功 敌军和你的军队@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]，即使它处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]状态（在这种情况下它失去远离状态，陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]）。

成功 如果军队有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]状态，它失去该状态。否则，它陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]。

失败 你军队的进军尝试失败。

大失败 你军队的进军尝试失败，并且队形混乱。陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.HbNAT8XxZD1OWMwE]{迟滞 Mired 1}，直到它下个回合开始。

All-Out Assault.name: 全军突击 All-Out Assault
All-Out Assault.description:
[攻击] [骑兵] [步兵]

需求: 毫无怜悯Merciless

你军队以可怕的力量发起进攻。尝试对一支敌军的AC进行一次近战打击。

大成功 你的军队对敌军造成[[/r 3]]点伤害。如果你的军队在该回合内进行的下个战争动作是对一支不同的敌军进行的，你的怒火被延伸到新目标，你在打击上有+1环境加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.zhHqV6jF0xhSADQT]{全军突击 All-Out Assault (大成功)}

成功 你的军队对目标军队造成[[/r 2]]点伤害。

失败 你的军队如同强弩之末，但依然对敌军造成[[/r 1]]点伤害。

大失败 你的军队没有对目标敌军造成伤害，并且陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]状态，直到它的下个回合开始。

Battle.name: 战斗 Battle
Battle.description:
你的军队攻击敌军，使用打击对抗敌军的AC。你只有在和目标敌军@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]时才能如此做。否则，你只能使用远程打击。军队在一场战争遭遇中最多使用5次远程打击（除非他拥有增加弹药战术）。由于带有攻击特征，在同一轮中多次进行打击会遭受多重攻击减值。攻城机械能使用战斗动作攻击和伤害防御工事。

大成功 你对敌军造成[[/r 2]]点伤害。

成功 你对敌军造成[[/r 1]]点伤害。

Battlefield Medicine.name: 战地医疗 Battlefield Medicine
Battlefield Medicine.description:
Infantry Skirmisher

Requirements Field Triage

Your army attempts to patch up an allied army’s wounds during battle.  Once you attempt this war action on an army, that army is temporarily immune to Battlefield Medicine for the remainder of the war encounter. Attempt a @Check[perception|dc:25|traits:action:battlefield-medicine]{Scouting} check to successfully sort the army’s wounded and provide swift aid.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.EUy6bVHHOrE5tVm3]{Battlefield Medicine Immunity}

Critical Success You restore [[/r 2]] HP to the target army.

Success You restore [[/r 1]] HP to the target army

Critical Failure Your attempt to heal the army fails, and that army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.eIQC69sOPbHAGxHC]{Weary} condition value increases by 1.

Counterattack.name: 反击 Counterattack
Counterattack.description:
[步兵] [散兵]

需求 灵活战术 Flexible Tactics

触发 一支和你接战的敌军尝试一次机动战争动作。

当敌人尝试机动的时候，你的军队猛击敌人。对触发的敌人尝试一次近战打击，对抗其AC。反击不应用你的多重攻击减值，你的多重攻击减值也不会因此增加。

大成功 你对敌军造成[[/r 1]]点伤害，它的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]值增加1点。

成功 你对敌军造成[[/r 1]]点伤害。

Covering Fire.name: 掩护射击 Covering Fire
Covering Fire.description:
[骑兵] [步兵] [散兵]

需求: 弹无虚发 Sharpshooter

你军队用远程火力为一支友军的机动动作提供掩护和保护。尝试一次远程打击对抗目标敌军的AC。

大成功 你对目标敌军造成[[/r 2]]点伤害，并且它无法使用由任意军队的机动战争动作触发的反应动作，直到你的下个回合开始。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.hGZBni0wBdgBo6mA]{掩护射击 Covering Fire (大成功)}

成功 你对目标敌军造成[[/r 1]]点伤害，并且它无法使用由任意军队的机动动作触发的反应动作，直到你的下个回合开始。

失败 你未能提供掩护射击，但仍然对敌军造成1点伤害。

大失败 你的尝试失败了。

Defensive Stance.name: 防御姿态 Defensive Stance
Defensive Stance.description:
Infantry Maneuver

Requirements Defensive Tactics

Your army hunkers down behind its shields, presents pole arms in a wall of blades, or moves into position to protect a target allied army that is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked}. Attempt a @Check[reflex|traits:action:defensive-stance]{Maneuver} check against an enemy army.

Critical Success The target allied army is no longer @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} by any army.

Success The target allied army is no longer @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} by the target army.

Critical Failure Your defensive stance fails, and your army is now @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} by the target enemy army.

Dirty Fighting.name: Dirty Fighting
Dirty Fighting.description:
Skirmisher

Requirements Flexible Tactics

Your army uses trickery, deception, and unfair tactics to attempt a devastating attack against an outflanked army. Attempt a melee Strike or a ranged Strike against the AC of a target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} army that is not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{Distant}.

Critical Success The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.eIQC69sOPbHAGxHC]{Weary 2} until the start of your next turn.

Success The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.eIQC69sOPbHAGxHC]{Weary 1} until the start of your next turn.

Critical Failure Your attack deals no damage to the target army, which is emboldened by your failed attempt at dirty fighting. This reduces the target army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.eIQC69sOPbHAGxHC]{Weary} value by 1.

False Retreat.name: False Retreat
False Retreat.description:
Infantry Morale Skirmisher

Requirements Flexible Tactics

Trigger Your army succeeds at a morale check.

Your army feigns defeat to trick an enemy army. Attempt a @Check[will|traits:action:false-retreat]{Morale} check against a target army.

Critical Success The target army is caught off guard by your army’s deception. It becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} and is unable to take reactions until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.j7RCpCggLJw9Kf2l]{False Retreat (Critical Success)}

Success The target army is caught off guard by your army’s deception and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of its next turn.

Critical Failure The enemy anticipated your tactic and moves to take advantage of the situation. Your army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of your next turn.

Feint.name: Feint
Feint.description:
Maneuver Infantry Skirmisher

Requirements Flexible Tactics

Your army launches a probing attack meant to trick the enemy into thinking you are attacking from one quarter while your real thrust comes elsewhere. Attempt a Maneuver check against the target army.

Critical Success The target army’s defenses are thrown off; it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the end of your turn. 

Success The target army is fooled, but only momentarily. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} against the next melee Strike your army attempts against it before the end of your current turn.

Critical Failure The enemy anticipates your feint and presses the advantage. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} by the target army until the end of your next turn.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description:
Maneuver

Your army spends a war action to adopt a defensive pose—raising shields, focusing on parrying attacks, or seeking cover. Attempt a @Check[reflex|traits:action:guard]{Maneuver} check against a target army.

Critical Success Your army gains a +2 item bonus to its AC until the start of your next turn; this bonus applies to all attacks against this army, not just from the targeted army.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.4aMsfeRodXmVm5HY]{Guard (Critical Success)}

Success Your army gains a +2 item bonus to its AC until the start of your next turn against attacks from the target army.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.X1ISHY0CaPXIsusg]{Guard (Success)}

Failure Your army fails to guard against the target army.

Critical Failure Your army fails spectacularly to guard against the target army and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.HbNAT8XxZD1OWMwE]{Mired 1}.

Outflank.name: Outflank
Outflank.description:
Cavalry Maneuver Skirmisher

Requirements Reckless Flankers, you aren’t @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} 

You send your army around an enemy’s flank to get a better attacking position and to push your enemy into disorder. Attempt a @Check[reflex|traits:action:outflank]{Maneuver} check against the target army. 

Critical Success The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of your next turn. You can choose to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} with that army or not.

Success The target army is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of your next turn. You are now @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} with that army.

Critical Failure You underestimate the target army’s position, and the blunder causes your army to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of your next turn.

Overwhelming Bombardment.name: Overwhelming Bombardment
Overwhelming Bombardment.description:
Siege

Requirements Explosive Shot 

Your siege engines focus all their fire on a fortification. This war action counts as using two ranged Strikes for the purposes of depleting an army’s shots. Attempt a ranged Strike against the target fortification’s AC.

Critical Success You deal [[/r 2]] points of damage to the fortification. You also deal [[/r 1]] point of damage to up to two armies of your choice that are within the fortification.

Success You deal [[/r 1]] point of damage to the fortification, and an additional [[/r 1]] point of damage either to the fortification or to an army within the fortification (your choice of which).

Failure You deal [[/r 1]] damage to the fortification. 

Critical Failure You deal no damage, and your army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of its next turn.

Rally.name: Rally
Rally.description:
Morale

Your army’s leaders attempt to bolster the soldiers’ morale and fight back the effects of fear and panic. Attempt a @Check[will|traits:action:rally]{Morale} check against a target enemy army of your choice.

Critical Success If your army is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.vUthCxz9am3slVR1]{Routed}, it loses the routed condition. 

Reduce your army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} condition by 2.

Success Reduce your army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} condition by 1.

Critical Failure Your attempt to rally backfires—increase your army’s  @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} condition by 1.

Retreat.name: Retreat
Retreat.description:
Prerequisites Your army is not engaged.

Your army tries to escape from the battlefield. If your army is already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{Distant}, it flees the battlefield, is no longer part of the war encounter, and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.vUthCxz9am3slVR1]{Routed}. Otherwise, your army gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{Distant} condition.

Disengage.name: Disengage
Disengage.description:
Maneuver

Your army attempts to disengage from enemy armies to put some distance between itself and the enemy. Attempt a @Check[reflex|traits:action:disengage]{Maneuver} check against each army your army is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} with. 

Critical Success Your army is no longer engaged with the target army. In addition, your army is automatically no longer engaged with any armies you haven’t yet rolled a Maneuver check against during this war action.

Success Your army breaks free and is no longer engaged with the target army.

Failure Your army remains engaged with the target army.

Critical Failure Your army remains engaged with the target army and, for the remainder of this turn, your army cannot attempt to disengage from any army with which it is still @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged}.

Taunt.name: Taunt
Taunt.description:
Morale

Requirements: Focused Devotion

Your army attempts to frighten and cow an enemy army. Attempt a @Check[will|traits:action:taunt]{Morale} check against the target army.

Critical Success The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken 2} until the start of your next turn.

Success The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken 1} until the start of your next turn.

Critical Failure Your failed attempt bolsters the enemy’s spirits. This  reduces the target army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} value by 1.

Army.name: Army
Army.description:
Armies are modeled using unlinked NPC actors. This means that changes to the actor in the sidebar propagate to all tokens, unless tokens override them. Therefore leveling up armies should be done on the base actor, whereas changing tactis, gear and HP should be done on the token instead.

In order to automate many tactics, existing statistics had to be repurposed:

  • Scouting: Perception
  • Recruitment/Standard DC: Fortitude
  • Morale: Will
  • Maneuver: Reflex
  • Consumption: Con
  • Rout Threshold: Str
